ai-tika-s0403t22:1_0: Two on the first occasion, while constantly and so on,
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_1: In the third very serving the first empty .
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_2: if he is able to lie down in private alone with a woman, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_3: if he sits down on a concealed seat with a woman, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_4: if he teaches more than five or six sentences to a woman, then he commits an offense entailing confession. Yet he displays an offense entailing confession.”
ai-tika-s0403t22:2_5: Hence it should be understood according to the precepts (saying): “He should be understood” .
ai-tika-s0403t22:4_0: The Book of the Long Discourses is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t22:5_0: Two on the fourth, wrapped in ointment.
ai-tika-s0403t22:6_0: Thus there is the plantains on the Uttarakuru
ai-tika-s0403t22:7_0: The refuse-rag wearer having the five colours because of the fall.
ai-tika-s0403t22:8_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-tika-s0403t22:9_0: if it is the upper limb.
